member.name: EMRMASKBLT
member.summary: The EMRMASKBLT structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record. Note that graphics device interface (GDI) converts the device-dependent bitmap into a device-independent bitmap (DIB) before storing it in the metafile record.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.rclBounds
member.summary: Bounding rectangle, in device units.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.xDest
member.summary: Logical x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.yDest
member.summary: Logical y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.cxDest
member.summary: Logical width of the destination rectangle.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.cyDest
member.summary: Logical height of the destination rectangle.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.dwRop
member.summary: Raster-operation code. These codes define how the color data of the source rectangle is to be combined with the color data of the destination rectangle to achieve the final color.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.xSrc
member.summary: Logical x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the source rectangle.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.ySrc
member.summary: Logical y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the source rectangle.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.xformSrc
member.summary: World-space to page-space transformation of the source device context.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.crBkColorSrc
member.summary: Background color (the RGB value) of the source device context. To make a COLORREF value, use the macro.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.iUsageSrc
member.summary: Value of the bmiColors member of the source structure. The iUsageSrc member can be either the DIB_PAL_COLORS or DIB_RGB_COLORS value.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.offBmiSrc
member.summary: Offset to source structure.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.cbBmiSrc
member.summary: Size of source structure.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.offBitsSrc
member.summary: Offset to source bitmap bits.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.cbBitsSrc
member.summary: Size of source bitmap bits.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.xMask
member.summary: Horizontal pixel offset into mask bitmap.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.yMask
member.summary: Vertical pixel offset into mask bitmap.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.iUsageMask
member.summary: Value of the bmiColors member of the mask structure.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.offBmiMask
member.summary: Offset to mask structure.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.cbBmiMask
member.summary: Size of mask structure.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.offBitsMask
member.summary: Offset to mask bitmap bits.

member.name: EMRMASKBLT.cbBitsMask
member.summary: Size of mask bitmap bits.
